Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1970...
Injured on 6/9/1970 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1971, off Jerry Nyman (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1971, off Ray Culp (PHI)...
Injured on 9/17/1971 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/1/1972 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1973, hitting .363 with 10 HR, 32 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/2/1973, hitting .579 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...

Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1976, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...

Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1978, hitting .349 with 3 HR, 23 RBI...
